Bellator is back in Europe for another double event in Dublin this week.

Bellator Europe 5 and Bellator 230 take place Saturday at Allianz Cloud in Milan, Italy. The Bellator Europe 5 card streams on the Bellator app and MMA Junkie. The Bellator 230 main card airs on Paramount and streams on DAZN via tape delay.

(Click here to open a PDF of the staff picks grid in a separate window.)

In one main event, Melvin Manhoef (31-14-1 MMA, 3-3 BMMA) takes on Yannick Bahati (9-4 MMA, 0-1 BMMA) in a light heavyweight bout. The oddsmakers have made Manhoef a decent favorite around -225, but our 13 MMA Junkie editors, writers, radio hosts and videographers are siding with Bahati at an 8-5 clip.

In the Bellator 230 portion of the card, former middleweight champion Rafael Carvalho (16-3 MMA, 7-2 BMMA) is moving up to light heavyweight to take on Vadim Nemkov (10-2 MMA, 3-0 BMMA). Our pickers don’t have much confidence in the Brazilian’s move up, apparently. They’re taking Nemkov at a hefty 11-2 landslide.

Also at Bellator Europe 5, Stefano Paterno (12-3-1 MMA, 0-0 BMMA) has only two pickers siding with him in his welterweight fight against Ashley Reece (8-1 MMA, 2-0 BMMA).

Late replacement Rafael Macedo (9-4 MMA, 0-0 BMMA) only has two pickers going with him in his lightweight fight against Kane Mousah (12-2 MMA, 0-1 BMMA).

And home-country fan favorite Alessio Sakara (19-13 MMA, 3-2 BMMA) is a heavy favorite at 12-1 against Canaan Grigsby (8-7 MMA, 0-0 BMMA) in their light heavyweight bout.

At Bellator 230, Hesdy Gerges (0-1 MMA, 0-1 BMMA) is a 10-3 pick at heavyweight against Dragos Zubko (2-1 MMA, 0-0 BMMA). Domingos Barros (6-0 MMA, 1-0 BMMA) is an overwhelming 12-1 pick against Kirill Sidelnikov (11-6 MMA, 0-1 BMMA) at heavyweight.

And Andrea Fusi (8-4 MMA, 1-0 BMMA) is a heavy 12-1 pick against Walter Pugliesi (4-2 MMA, 0-1 BMMA) in their welterweight bout.

In the MMA Junkie reader consensus picks, Manhoef (69%), Reece (73 percent), Sakara (89 percent), Mousah (81 percent), Nemkov (61 percent), Barros (77 percent), Zubko (74 percent) and Fusi (81 percent) are the choices.

Check out all the picks above.
description: Check out our staff members picks for the Bellator Europe 5 and Bellator 230 main cards in Milan, Italy.
